articles.content:
Wreath to Bier of Late Jang Chol 
    Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il today sent a wreath to the bier of the late Jang Chol, member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Literature and the Arts of Korea, to express deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Racket Denounced
articles.content:
Peace Movement against U.S. and War Called for 
    Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Student Solidarity for the Implementation of the June 15 South-North Joint Declaration on August 25 reportedly released an appeal titled "All the youth and students should turn out in the movement for defending peace against the U.S. and war".
 The appeal denounced the U.S. for working out the "operation plan 5030" and further strengthening "psychological warfare to shake the north's system", while openly disclosing its attempt to make a preemptive nuclear attack on the north. It said that the recent anti-DPRK racket kicked up by the ultra-right conservatives in Taegu is related to the U.S. Korea policy.    
 The Korean nation would turn out in the struggle to deal a decisive blow to the U.S. wild ambition for supremacy through the united anti-U.S. and anti-war movement and make the U.S. pay for soiling this land, committing all sorts of crimes, it stressed.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Portuguese President
DPRK Ambassador to U.K. Appointed
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Portuguese President 
    Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Portuguese President George Sampaio in connection with the fact that intense heat caused many human casualties and material losses in Portugal.
 The message hoped that the government and people of Portugal would undo the consequences of natural disaster and put the living of people in the afflicted areas to normal at an early date.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Italian President
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to U.K. Appointed
    Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho was appointed DPRK ambassador to the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Malaysia
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Italian President
    Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to Italian President Carlo Azeglio Ciampi on August 28 in connection with the fact that a long spell of intense heat claimed not a few casualties and did huge damage to agricultural production in Italy.
 The message hoped that the Italian government and people would eradicate the aftereffect of natural disaster at an early date.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry on Six-way Talks
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Malaysia
    Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a message of greetings to Tuanku Syed Sirajuddin Ibni Al-Marhum Tuanku Syed Putra Jamalullail, king of Malaysia, on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of its national day.
 In the belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would expand in the future, too, the message sincerely wished the king good health and happiness.
